replies.body: So, it appears your two week break coincidentally ended and this was the only game you played after it. Was the two week break you just took in fact a ban placed by Riot that *forced* you to "take a break"?

If you got permabanned, you definitely got off a 14-day ban at some point or another. Some things that you did that are reportable/bannable are

A) Giving up/Saying the game is over

B) Saying ez/easy at the end of a game

he wasn't giving up, in fact he asked for his teammates to stop typing and to continue playing the game as he did.

meh. the game at its core i like. Im also good at the game when im not tilted. But too many side things going on to keep me tilted. The biggest issue is the mmr system. The more you lose the  more stressful the game gets no matter if youare in silver 2 or bronze 5. Like i toggled from sliver 3/silver 2 a few times. I even won like 7 ina row once and got promoted to slver 2. Then had a few games where i had people getting dc and we lose and the tilt starts. After i lose those 2 games that felt out of my control i have no way of still feeling positive. Again, if im in b5 or silver 2 when i am like this there is no turning back. Its just a depressing slide all the wy to B5. I just feel like i prove myself again and again that i can play at a certain level but then a few bad games and im in b5. So i dont mind losing lane or making mistakes and owning up to them. Its just all the extra bs that makes this game not fun. 
ALSO READ THIS. I have played flex q and it was like 100x more fun, less stress and more teamwork. Its just solo q that seems unbareable but the people i used to play with dont play anymore.

Then you come back, be negative (again-reportable) then tell another player to “stfu” (reportable-doesn’t matter if they started It). You deserve the ban. Maybe play a less competitive game or play vs boy cause you clearly can’t handle yourself.
